00062     template <class ValueType>
00063     inline ValueType DeepCopy(const ValueType& value)
00064     {
00065         return ValueType(value);
00066     }
00067 
00069     inline wxString DeepCopy(const wxString& value)
00070     {
00071         return wxString(value.c_str(), value.Length());
00072     }

00183     // Notification utilities
00184     
00191     class CMuleNotiferBase
00192     {
00193     public:
00195         CMuleNotiferBase() {};
00197         virtual ~CMuleNotiferBase() {};
00198 
00200         virtual void Notify() const = 0;
00202         virtual CMuleNotiferBase* Clone() const = 0;
00203     };
00204 
00205 
00207     class CMuleNotifier0 : public CMuleNotiferBase
00208     {
00209     public:
00210         typedef void (*FuncType)();
00211         
00213         CMuleNotifier0(FuncType func)
00214             : m_func(func) {}
00215 
00217         virtual void Notify() const {
00218             m_func();
00219         }
00220 
00222         virtual CMuleNotiferBase* Clone() const {
00223             return new CMuleNotifier0(m_func);
00224         }       
00225 
00226     private:
00227         FuncType    m_func;
00228     };
00229 
00230 
00232     template <typename ARG>
00233     class CMuleNotifier1 : public CMuleNotiferBase
00234     {
00235     public:
00236         typedef void (*FuncType)(ARG);
00237         
00239         CMuleNotifier1(FuncType func, ARG arg)
00240             : m_func(func),
00241               m_arg(DeepCopy(arg))
00242         {}
00243 
00245         virtual void Notify() const {
00246             m_func(m_arg);
00247         }
00248 
00250         virtual CMuleNotiferBase* Clone() const {
00251             return new CMuleNotifier1<ARG>(m_func, m_arg);
00252         }
00253 
00254     private:
00255         FuncType    m_func;
00256         ARG         m_arg;
00257     };
00258 
00259 
00261     template <typename ARG_1, typename ARG_2>
00262     class CMuleNotifier2 : public CMuleNotiferBase
00263     {
00264     public:
00265         typedef void (*FuncType)(ARG_1, ARG_2);
00266         
00268         CMuleNotifier2(FuncType func, ARG_1 arg1, ARG_2 arg2)
00269             : m_func(func),
00270               m_arg1(DeepCopy(arg1)),
00271               m_arg2(DeepCopy(arg2))
00272         {}
00273 
00275         virtual void Notify() const {
00276             m_func(m_arg1, m_arg2);
00277         }
00278 
00280         virtual CMuleNotiferBase* Clone() const {
00281             return new CMuleNotifier2<ARG_1, ARG_2>(m_func, m_arg1, m_arg2);
00282         }
00283 
00284     private:
00285         FuncType    m_func;
00286         ARG_1       m_arg1;
00287         ARG_2       m_arg2;
00288     };
00289 
00290 
00292     template <typename ARG_1, typename ARG_2, typename ARG_3>
00293     class CMuleNotifier3 : public CMuleNotiferBase
00294     {
00295     public:
00296         typedef void (*FuncType)(ARG_1, ARG_2, ARG_3);
00297         
00299         CMuleNotifier3(FuncType func, ARG_1 arg1, ARG_2 arg2, ARG_3 arg3)
00300             : m_func(func),
00301               m_arg1(DeepCopy(arg1)),
00302               m_arg2(DeepCopy(arg2)),
00303               m_arg3(DeepCopy(arg3))
00304         {}
00305 
00307         virtual void Notify() const {
00308             m_func(m_arg1, m_arg2, m_arg3);
00309         }
00310 
00312         virtual CMuleNotiferBase* Clone() const {
00313             return new CMuleNotifier3<ARG_1, ARG_2, ARG_3>(m_func, m_arg1, m_arg2, m_arg3);
00314         }
00315 
00316     private:
00317         FuncType    m_func;
00318         ARG_1       m_arg1;
00319         ARG_2       m_arg2;
00320         ARG_3       m_arg3;
00321     };
00322 
00323 
00331     class CMuleGUIEvent : public wxEvent
00332     {
00333     public:
00335         CMuleGUIEvent(CMuleNotiferBase* ntf)
00336             : wxEvent(-1, MULE_EVT_NOTIFY)
00337             , m_functor(ntf)
00338         {
00339             wxASSERT(m_functor);
00340         }
00341         
00343         virtual ~CMuleGUIEvent() {
00344             delete m_functor;
00345         }
00346         
00348         void Notify() const {
00349             m_functor->Notify();
00350         }
00351 
00353         virtual wxEvent* Clone() const {
00354             return new CMuleGUIEvent(m_functor->Clone());
00355         }
00356         
00357     private:
00359         CMuleGUIEvent(const CMuleGUIEvent&);
00361         CMuleGUIEvent& operator=(const CMuleGUIEvent&);
00362         
00364         CMuleNotiferBase* m_functor;
00365     };
00366 
00367     
00376     void HandleNotification(const CMuleNotiferBase& ntf);
00377     
00392     inline void DoNotify(void (*func)()) {
00393         HandleNotification(CMuleNotifier0(func));
00394     }
00395     template <typename A1A, typename A1B>
00396     inline void DoNotify(void (*func)(A1A), A1B arg1) {
00397         HandleNotification(CMuleNotifier1<A1A>(func, arg1));
00398     }
00399     template <typename A1A, typename A1B, typename A2A, typename A2B>
00400     inline void DoNotify(void (*func)(A1A, A2A), A1B arg1, A2B arg2) {
00401         HandleNotification(CMuleNotifier2<A1A, A2A>(func, arg1, arg2));
00402     }
00403     template <typename A1A, typename A1B, typename A2A, typename A2B, typename A3A, typename A3B>
00404     inline void DoNotify(void (*func)(A1A, A2A, A3A), A1B arg1, A2B arg2, A3B arg3) {
00405         HandleNotification(CMuleNotifier3<A1A, A2A, A3A>(func, arg1, arg2, arg3));
00406     }
00408 
00413     void HandleNotificationAlways(const CMuleNotiferBase& ntf);
00414     
00415     inline void DoNotifyAlways(void (*func)()) {
00416         HandleNotificationAlways(CMuleNotifier0(func));
00417     }
00418     template <typename A1A, typename A1B>
00419     inline void DoNotifyAlways(void (*func)(A1A), A1B arg1) {
00420         HandleNotificationAlways(CMuleNotifier1<A1A>(func, arg1));
00421     }
00422     template <typename A1A, typename A1B, typename A2A, typename A2B>
00423     inline void DoNotifyAlways(void (*func)(A1A, A2A), A1B arg1, A2B arg2) {
00424         HandleNotificationAlways(CMuleNotifier2<A1A, A2A>(func, arg1, arg2));
00425     }
00426     template <typename A1A, typename A1B, typename A2A, typename A2B, typename A3A, typename A3B>
00427     inline void DoNotifyAlways(void (*func)(A1A, A2A, A3A), A1B arg1, A2B arg2, A3B arg3) {
00428         HandleNotificationAlways(CMuleNotifier3<A1A, A2A, A3A>(func, arg1, arg2, arg3));
00429     }
00430 }

00437 typedef void (wxEvtHandler::*MuleNotifyEventFunction)(CMuleGUIEvent&);
00438 
00440 #define EVT_MULE_NOTIFY(func) \
00441     DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE_ENTRY(MULE_EVT_NOTIFY, -1, -1, \
00442     (wxObjectEventFunction) (wxEventFunction) \
00443     wxStaticCastEvent(MuleNotifyEventFunction, &func), (wxObject*) NULL),
